author: Elastic
description: Halfbaked is a malware family used to establish persistence in a contested network. This rule detects a network activity algorithm leveraged by Halfbaked implant beacons for command and control.
false_positives: This rule should be tailored to exclude systems, either as sources or destinations, in which this behavior is expected.
name: Halfbaked Command and Control Beacon
note:
## Threat intel

This activity has been observed in FIN7 campaigns.
query:
event.category:(network OR network_traffic) AND network.protocol:http AND
  network.transport:tcp AND url.full:/http:\/\/[0-9]{1,3}.[0-9]{1,3}.[0-9]{1,3}.[0-9]{1,3}\/cd/ AND
  destination.port:(53 OR 80 OR 8080 OR 443)
